annotations.description: In This video we dive into a few recipes which can be found in our good friend Dave Stolte's book Home Bar Basics And Not So Basics. The book fits each recip...
annotations.title: Slings, Sours, Grogs and Nogs

textContent:
1oz (30ml) IPA
1oz (30ml) Cynar
.75oz (22.5ml) Applejack
.75oz (22.5ml) Lemon Juice
.75oz (22.5ml) Honey Syrup
IPA Float
Grapefruit Twist

Shake all ingredients (including IPA) without ice then with ice. 
Open pour into rocks glass. 
Float IPA and garnish with grapefruit twist

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3ffsVcmId7U
title: Detroiter
